scripts.deploy-staging: REACT_APP_REDI_LOCATION=berlin env-cmd -f .env.staging yarn build && aws s3 rm s3://app.staging.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://app.staging.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:staging
scripts.deploy-production: yarn deploy-production:berlin && yarn deploy-production:munich && yarn deploy-production:nrw && yarn deploy-production:location-picker
scripts.deploy-production:location-picker: REACT_APP_REDI_LOCATION=location-picker env-cmd -f .env.production yarn build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:prod:location-picker
scripts.deploy-production:berlin: REACT_APP_REDI_LOCATION=berlin env-cmd -f .env.production yarn build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.berlin.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://connect.berlin.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:prod:berlin
scripts.deploy-production:munich: REACT_APP_REDI_LOCATION=munich env-cmd -f .env.production yarn build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.munich.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://connect.munich.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:prod:munich
scripts.deploy-production:nrw: REACT_APP_REDI_LOCATION=nrw env-cmd -f .env.production yarn build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.nrw.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://connect.nrw.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:prod:nrw
scripts.deploy-demonstration: REACT_APP_REDI_LOCATION=munich env-cmd -f .env.demonstration yarn build && aws s3 rm s3://app.demo.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://app.demo.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:demonstration
